arts.ttl: Chelsea issue dubbed 'crazy' amid Cole Palmer injury update ahead of Liverpool showdown
arts.sum: Cole Palmer will be a major absentee for Chelsea as they host Liverpool in the Premier League on Saturday, with Enzo Maresca providing an update on the player

arts.sum: Maresca experienced the death of team-mate Antonio Puerta when he was playing for Sevilla.

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca reveals Liverpool 'vulnerability' ahead of Premier League clash
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca has been speaking ahead of his side's Premier League clash with Liverpool on Saturday evening, and has pinpointed a 'vulnerability' in the Reds

arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Liverpool predictions: Reds to leave Enzo feeling blue
arts.sum: Steve Davies suggests you ignore the kneejerk reactions to a couple of Liverpool reverses and back the champions to win at Stamford Bridge.

Alisson, Chiesa, Ekitike: Chelsea learn Liverpool team news as Arne Slot confirms starting goalkeeper
arts.sum: The former's injury looked way more serious, though, so it is hardly a surprise that the goalkeeper will not make Liverpool's travelling squad to West London. Liverpool head coach Arne Slot has ruled goalkeeper Alisson out of Saturday's trip to Chelsea, with two other players doubtful.

arts.ttl: 'Lack of trust' - Maresca's problems at Chelsea laid bare ahead of Liverpool
arts.sum: Despite spending heavily again in the summer, glaring issues remain within Enzo Maresca's squad and Chelsea have underwhelmed to start the 2025/26 campaign as a result.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot delivers Alexander Isak reality check ahead of Liverpool vs Chelsea
arts.sum: Alexander Isak has been handled carefully since his blockbuster transfer to Liverpool and Arne Slot has explained why it will still be some time before fans see the best of him

arts.ttl: Liverpool handed major fitness boost ahead of Chelsea clash with key player available after he 'felt something' in Champions League loss at Galatasaray
arts.sum: Liverpool may have a growing list of injury concerns, but Arne Slot's worries have been eased with the news that one of his key players is available for action.
